Description.Text: Berr Hotel is a friendly 4-star property offering comfortable accommodation in historic Istanbul. Highlights include a sauna, steam room, onsite restaurant and an excellent location within short walking distance of the Fatih Mosque. Fatih is a large district constituting the majority of historic Constantinople. Its centre is characterised by majestic Byzantine cathedrals and beautiful Ottoman mosques, whilst its western section is largely residential and boasts excellent road and public transport links. Nearby places of interest include the ancient city walls, the impressive Fatih Mosque and the large parks that mark the historic boundaries of the city. Emniyet-Fatih metro station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Istanbul destinations. The hotel is housed in a mid-rise corner property with a colourful, flat faÃ§ade. Facilities include a sauna, steam room and gift shop. Standard rooms are unpretentiously decorated in a simple style with patterned fabrics and white walls. Amenities include air-conditioning, a TV, mini-bar, safe and an en-suite bathroom. The informal hotel restaurant serves local and international cuisine in a friendly space. Light meals and drinks can be enjoyed in the lobby lounge, and Orange Bar offers a relaxing spot for guests to enjoy a drink. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are also plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel provides 24-hour reception and room service.
